[[Mecha-Naruto]] launches either a single or a multitude of missiles from its mechanised chest cavity. When Mecha-Naruto does this, its forehead protector changes to read {{translation|[[wikipedia:missle|"missile"]]|ミサイル|misairu}}.

== Variants ==
* Mecha-Naruto will launch a large cluster of missiles from its chest cavity. When used in flight mode, it can be launched as a mid-range attack. [[Neji]] refers to these as {{translation|"''Mecha Bombs''"|メカボム|Meka Bomu}}.
* It can also launch a much larger missile to generate greater damage. If this missile is damaged in any way, it can then split into a cluster of smaller missiles.
